backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor serving as the backend entry point.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting a date formatting change requirement for uppercase month names in frontend/src/lib/pstDate.ts.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend components, hooks, utilities, and screens including animations, sound effects, achievements, and UI elements.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH color system variables for light and dark themes, including sidebar, chart, and UI component colors.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading Orbitron and Exo 2 fonts from Google Fonts and mounting the React app at #root.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component configuring TanStack Router with six routes (dashboard, log, history, analytics, advanced-stats, settings) and wrapping with theme, store, SFX, and focus mode providers.
frontend/src/assets/generated.ts: Asset path constants for generated images including rank badges, metal textures, stickman sprites, backgrounds, orbs, coins, chests, and card frames.
frontend/src/components/achievements/Ach: Empty file for achievement card component.
Empty file for achievement unlock popup component.
Empty file for achievement unlock provider component.
frontend/src/components/achievements/Tro: Empty file for trophy icon component.
frontend/src/components/AppShell.tsx: Main layout component rendering frosted background, outlet for routed content, bottom navigation, and applying focus mode dimming effect.
frontend/src/components/BackupRestorePan: Settings panel component for exporting/importing JSON backups of all app data with sound effects, haptic feedback, and error handling.
frontend/src/components/BottomNav.tsx: Fixed bottom navigation bar with five tabs (Dashboard, Log, History, Analytics, Settings) featuring active state styling, sound effects, haptics, and focus mode integration.
frontend/src/components/chests/CardRevea: Animated card flip component that reveals chest reward values with tier-specific colors and glow effects after a delay.
frontend/src/components/chests/ChestOpen: Dialog component managing chest opening flow with three stages: confirmation, opening animation, and card reveal sequence with sound/haptic feedback.
frontend/src/components/chests/ChestShop: Chest shop interface displaying user balance, chest purchase options, bonus modifier toggles, and recent chest opening history.
frontend/src/components/chests/ChestTile: Displays a clickable chest tile with tier-specific image, cost, card count, and lock icon when unaffordable. Plays sound and haptic feedback on purchase.
frontend/src/components/coins/CoinBalanc: Fixed-position badge showing current coin balance with rolling counter animation, glow effect, and sound/haptic feedback when coins increase.
Sheet component displaying detailed daily statistics including total reps, individual sessions with sets, duration, weight, and tags.
frontend/src/components/DisciplineScoreC: Card component displaying calculated discipline score as animated percentage with explanation text using RollingCounter animation.
frontend/src/components/EnergyOrb.tsx: Canvas-based animated orb visualization showing progress percentage with pulsing glow effects, trend-based velocity multipliers, and optional dimming.
frontend/src/components/FatigueRing.tsx: Renders a circular canvas-based fatigue meter with a gradient arc (green to yellow to red) that fills based on a 0-100 score, displaying the numeric value in the center.
frontend/src/components/FrostedBackgroun: Renders a full-screen animated canvas background with a slowly shifting gradient and blur effect, handling window resize events.
frontend/src/components/GlowingRingMeter: Displays an animated circular progress meter with a pulsing glow effect, smooth value transitions, and a centered numeric label.
Renders a 365-day line graph of total reps on canvas with animated drawing, clickable data points, and day selection callback.
frontend/src/components/HistoryGraphLife: Displays a lifetime strength curve graph on canvas showing rolling max values over all sessions with animated gradient line drawing.
frontend/src/components/InsightsPanel.ts: Displays AI-generated performance insights with confidence bars in a glass-card styled panel using the insights intelligence module.
frontend/src/components/MetricCard.tsx: A reusable card component displaying a metric title, value, optional icon, and subtitle with glass-card styling.
frontend/src/components/MicroProgressCel: Shows a temporary bottom-centered toast notification with a message and plays a micro-progress sound effect, auto-dismissing after 2 seconds.
frontend/src/components/MilestoneCelebra: Full-screen overlay celebrating milestone achievements with trophy emoji, title, description, sound effect, and haptic feedback, auto-dismissing after 3 seconds.
frontend/src/components/PredictedMaxPane: Displays strength predictions for 7, 30, and 90-day horizons with confidence percentages and overall trend indicator using adaptive strength calculations.
frontend/src/components/RankBadge.tsx: Renders an interactive hexagonal SVG rank badge with animated glow effects, gradient fills, holographic sweep, and tap feedback with sound/haptics.
frontend/src/components/RankPromotionOve: Full-screen overlay celebrating rank promotions with animated rank badge, sound effect, and haptic feedback, auto-dismissing after 3 seconds.
frontend/src/components/ReadinessMeter.t: Animated circular progress meter displaying readiness score with color-coded arc (green to red) and status text, using canvas for smooth animation.
frontend/src/components/RecordCelebratio: Full-screen overlay that displays "NEW RECORD!" message with sound effects and haptic feedback, auto-dismissing after 2.5 seconds.
Alert dialog component with confirmation prompt to permanently delete all user data including sessions, records, and settings.
frontend/src/components/RollingCounter.t: Animated number counter that smoothly transitions from current to target value using easeOutQuart easing over configurable duration.
frontend/src/components/SessionBuilder.t: Interactive form with wheel pickers for configuring workout session parameters (sets, reps, weight, duration) with focus mode and sound effects.
frontend/src/components/SessionQualityOv: Full-screen overlay displaying session quality score (ELITE/EXCELLENT/GREAT/GOOD) with sound effects, auto-dismissing after 2.5 seconds.
frontend/src/components/StickmanPullupRi: SVG-based animated stickman performing pull-ups with breathing animation when idle, dynamic arm/leg movement, and glow effect at high volume.
frontend/src/components/StickmanVolumeCo: Volume control interface combining vertical slider with animated stickman that performs pull-ups on volume changes, includes haptic feedback and tick sounds.
frontend/src/components/StreakFlame.tsx: Canvas-based animated flame effect that scales with streak count, using gradient colors and ellipse shapes with sinusoidal motion.
frontend/src/components/SweatParticles.t: Canvas-based particle system that spawns and animates green sweat droplets with gravity and fade-out effects when active.
frontend/src/components/TagMultiSelect.t: Multi-select tag component that displays predefined tags as toggleable badges with custom styling for selected/unselected states.
frontend/src/components/VerticalVolumeSl: Vertical slider with draggable knob that provides haptic feedback and sound effects on step changes, includes scroll locking during drag.
frontend/src/components/WheelPicker.tsx: Scrollable wheel picker with inertia physics, snap-to-center behavior, boundary resistance, and sound effects for value selection.
frontend/src/hooks/useAchievements.tsx: Empty file placeholder for achievements hook functionality.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages an Internet Computer actor with authentication, invalidating dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useFocusMode.tsx: Context provider and hook for managing global focus mode state (enter/exit) across the application.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context with login/logout functionality, identity management, and status tracking using AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/usePSTSync.ts: Polls every 60 seconds to detect Pakistan Standard Time midnight transitions and notifies registered callbacks when the date changes.
frontend/src/hooks/usePullupStore.tsx: Main app state provider managing sessions, settings, and coins via IndexedDB with methods to add sessions, refresh data, and update settings.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file noting the app is fully offline and uses IndexedDB through usePullupStore instead of queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useRankProgress.ts: Calculates current rank, next rank, and progress based on lifetime total reps from sessions, with promotion detection logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useScrollLock.ts: Locks and unlocks page scrolling by manipulating body styles, preserving scroll position when locked.
frontend/src/hooks/useSfx.tsx: Context provider for sound effects management with volume control, persisting settings to IndexedDB and interfacing with sfxManager.
frontend/src/index.css: Global styles with Tailwind setup, CSS custom properties for dark theme, and keyframe animations for chest opening, coin bursts, card flips, and rank badges.
frontend/src/lib/achievements/definition: Empty file placeholder for achievement definitions.
frontend/src/lib/achievements/detector.t: Empty file placeholder for achievement detection logic.
frontend/src/lib/achievements/service.ts: Empty file placeholder for achievement service functionality.
frontend/src/lib/achievements/types.ts: Empty file placeholder for achievement type definitions.
frontend/src/lib/analytics.ts: Calculates fatigue score (based on 7-day average vs today) and consistency score (days worked in last 30 days) from pullup sessions.
frontend/src/lib/animations.ts: Exports reusable animation configurations for pulse, fade-in-up, and blur transitions using Framer Motion syntax.
frontend/src/lib/backup.ts: Exports and imports backup data as JSON files by interfacing with offlineDb and using browser download/file upload mechanisms.
frontend/src/lib/economy/chestOpenFlow.t: Orchestrates the chest opening transaction: deducts coins, draws cards with modifiers, persists records with PST dates, updates wallet, and handles rollback on errors.
frontend/src/lib/economy/chestsTypes.ts: Defines TypeScript types and constants for chest tiers (common, rare, epic), chest definitions, open records, card wallet items, and modifiers.
frontend/src/lib/economy/coinRewards.ts: Calculates coin rewards for pullup sessions based on reps, quality score, milestones, streak bonuses, and PR achievements.
frontend/src/lib/economy/drawCards.ts: Draws a specified number of cards for a chest tier using weighted probability tables modified by active modifiers.
frontend/src/lib/economy/drawTables.ts: Defines base probability tables for card values per chest tier and provides a weighted random draw helper function.
Service layer that awards coins by calculating rewards from context and persisting them, tracking the last award event.
frontend/src/lib/economy/economyStore.ts: Centralized store operations for coins, chest history, card wallet, and modifiers, all backed by offlineDb.
frontend/src/lib/economy/modifiers.ts: Manages modifier state (streak, daily bonus) including updates after chest opens, checks for active modifiers, and applies probability adjustments.
frontend/src/lib/haptics.ts: Triggers haptic feedback patterns (light, medium, strong, special, chest-open, card-reveal) using the navigator.vibrate API.
frontend/src/lib/intelligence/adaptiveSt: Predicts future max pullup performance at 7, 30, and 90-day horizons with confidence scores based on recent trend analysis.
frontend/src/lib/intelligence/advancedSt: Calculates advanced statistics including lifetime reps, most productive week, fastest improvement period, and strength velocity.
frontend/src/lib/intelligence/discipline: Computes a discipline score (0-100) based on training consistency, streak stability, recent activity, and missed days over 60 days.
frontend/src/lib/intelligence/fatigue.ts: Calculates overall fatigue (0-100) from last 7 days based on volume, session frequency, and insufficient rest since last session.
frontend/src/lib/intelligence/fatigueLoa: Computes separate muscular fatigue and nervous system load metrics using exponential decay over the last 14 days of sessions.
frontend/src/lib/intelligence/insights.t: Generates performance insights from pull-up sessions, analyzing time-of-day performance, rest duration patterns, and training frequency to provide actionable recommendations with confidence scores.
frontend/src/lib/intelligence/lifetimeSt: Calculates a lifetime strength curve by tracking daily max reps and rolling maximum values over time to visualize long-term progress.
frontend/src/lib/intelligence/longTermTr: Analyzes long-term training trends by comparing first and second half averages of recent sessions, returning direction (up/stable/down), strength, and a velocity multiplier for progress visualization.
frontend/src/lib/intelligence/microProgr: Detects micro-progress events by comparing new sessions against recent averages and personal bests, identifying incremental improvements and new records.
frontend/src/lib/intelligence/milestones: Detects and creates milestone achievements based on lifetime totals (10, 100, 1000 reps), training streaks (7, 30 days), and session-to-session improvements.
frontend/src/lib/intelligence/pressure.t: Calculates training pressure state based on days since last session, triggering warnings after 3+ days and computing intensity for motivational prompts.
Computes a readiness score (0-100) and status (Peak/Ready/Moderate/Fatigued/Critical) based on recovery time, streak bonuses, fatigue, and recent training intensity, providing training recommendations.
frontend/src/lib/intelligence/sessionQua: Evaluates individual session quality by scoring consistency against recent averages, improvement relative to personal records, and fatigue management based on training frequency.
frontend/src/lib/offlineDb.ts: Manages IndexedDB for offline storage of sessions, settings, quality records, milestones, coins, chest history, card wallet, and modifiers with versioned schema migrations.
frontend/src/lib/predefinedTags.ts: Exports a predefined list of training session tags covering time of day, effort level, grip types, and training locations.
frontend/src/lib/pstDate.ts: Provides Pakistan Standard Time (UTC+5) date utilities for offline timezone conversion, formatting, parsing, and calculating time until midnight PST.
frontend/src/lib/ranks.ts: Defines a progression system with 17 rank tiers (Bronze to Ascendant) and provides utility functions to calculate current rank, next rank, and progress based on total reps.
frontend/src/lib/reset.ts: Exports a function to clear all offline database data and reload the page, effectively resetting the application state.
frontend/src/lib/sfx.ts: Manages sound effects for the application with a SfxManager class that loads, plays, stops, and controls volume for various game-like audio events (button clicks, chest opens, celebrations, etc.).
frontend/src/lib/stats.ts: Provides statistical calculation functions for pullup sessions including lifetime totals, daily aggregations, streak tracking, personal records, and time-based averages (weekly, monthly).
frontend/src/lib/types.ts: Defines TypeScript interfaces for the application's core data structures including pullup sessions, sets, daily stats, user settings, rank info, streaks, and personal records.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers, then renders the main App component.
Empty file placeholder for an achievements screen component.
frontend/src/screens/AdvancedStatsScreen: Displays advanced statistics including lifetime reps, total sessions, averages, strength velocity, most productive week, and fastest improvement period using calculated metrics.
frontend/src/screens/AnalyticsScreen.tsx: Shows comprehensive analytics with rank badge, lifetime stats, personal records, and readiness/fatigue metrics calculated from session history.
frontend/src/screens/DashboardScreen.tsx: Main dashboard displaying current rank badge, coin balance, rank progress bar, today's goal progress, and streak information with PST date synchronization.
frontend/src/screens/HistoryScreen.tsx: Displays pull-up history with a 365-day timeline, graphs (365-day and lifetime), and statistics cards showing weekly average, monthly total, and personal records. Uses formatPSTDateForDisplay to render dates in the timeline.
frontend/src/screens/LogScreen.tsx: Main session logging screen that handles pull-up session creation, tag selection, and displays celebrations for rank promotions, records, milestones, and micro-progress. Uses formatPSTDateForDisplay to show the current PST date and listens for midnight transitions.
frontend/src/screens/SettingsScreen.tsx: Settings interface for volume control, daily goal configuration, chest shop access, backup/restore functionality, and data reset options. Does not directly use date formatting functions.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom color schemes (app-bg, app-text, app-accent), border radius variables, box shadows, and keyframe animations for the application's design system.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking feature requests to update date formatting in pstDate.ts to display month names in all uppercase letters (e.g., 'JANUARY' instead of current format).
